short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nur is an Islamic new tab extension that reminds you of a verse from the Qurâ€™an every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nur inspires you with a verse of the Qur'an every time you open a new tab, beautifully framed against the serene backdrop of nature. As you browse the web, you are constantly reminded of the profound teachings and beauty of the Qur'an and the creation.

âœ¨ Memorization Mode: Enable this mode to focus on memorizing verses from a specific Surah.  Click on the menu in the bottom right and select a Surah, and Nur will display verses from that Surah to aid in your memorization efforts.

ðŸ“– Show transliteration: Easily enable transliteration to aid in reading and recitation of the verse.

ðŸ”— Show Most Visited websites: Access your frequently visited sites and bookmarks directly from the new tab for convenience.
